name: Chess Club (itch)
description: A 3D solo-multiplayer chess game combines the best of both worlds, allowing players to enjoy the game both alone and with others. Play against yourself in single-player mode, or switch to multiplayer mode to connect with your friends and compete in real-time matches. With the option to customize your game settings, you can create a unique experience tailored to your preferences. With intuitive controls and stunning 3D graphics, a solo-multiplayer chess game provides a comprehensive and engaging chess experience for players of all levels. Whether you prefer to play alone or with others, you'll find endless entertainment in this versatile and immersive game.
